props.className: container mx-auto max-w-4xl px-4 py-12 md:px-6 md:py-16

props.content: Set up your API endpoint and parameters.

props.className: p-2 rounded-md border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-700 mb-4 w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100
p-2 rounded-md border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-700 mb-4 w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100
p-2 rounded-md border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-700 mb-4 w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100

props.placeholder: Enter Body (for POST requests, JSON format)

props.className: px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white font-semibold rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition duration-300 ease-in-out
props.onclick: var apiUrl = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('traqix_mem_api_url')).value || ''; var method = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('traqix_mem_api_method')).value || 'GET'; var headers = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('traqix_mem_api_headers')).value || '{}'; var body = JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('traqix_mem_api_body')).value || null; fetch(apiUrl, { method: method, headers: JSON.parse(headers), body: method === 'POST' ? body : null }).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { window.localStorage.setItem('traqix_mem_api_result', JSON.stringify({type:'string',value:JSON.stringify(data)})); }).catch(error => { window.localStorage.setItem('traqix_mem_api_result', JSON.stringify({type: 'string', value: 'Error fetching data'})); });

props.className: mt-4 p-2 rounded-md border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-700 w-full focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100
